items.sentence: Tom could lose everything if he\'s not careful.
Tom couldn\'t believe Mary just hung up on him.
Tom couldn\'t persuade Mary to accept his gift.
Tom crossed the bridge to get to Mary\'s house.
Make sure that you don\'t get on the wrong bus.
Tom didn\'t say we weren\'t allowed to do this.
Why do you want to make your boyfriend jealous?
Tom is talking to the French teacher right now.
Don\'t do the crime, if you can\'t do the time.
Tom told Mary that he\'d stay at John\'s place.
